#summary Survey shot edit

= QTopoShot - Survey shot edit =


You open the "Shot edit" dialog by double-clicking on a shot row in the table.
This dialog display seven possible action. 
They are exclusive: you can pick only one of them.
lick the "Cancel" button if you want no action to take effect.

    * Change the shot properties. You can add/modify the shot comment. You can also change the "extend" flag and the additional flag.
    * Renumber the shots from this one onwards.
    * Merge the shot with the following one.
    * Split the shot in its components. This applies only to shots that are the average of more DistoX data.
    * Insert a new shot after (or before) this shot.
    * Delete the shot.
    * Mark this shot as the start of the plot.
